attributes.action: Help the homeless through corona outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
Not one person has mentioned how we can help the homeless during this covid-19 pandemic, they can not isolate them self, some
Are extremely unwell and elderly.

These have been ignored and left.

Also if the homeless can not isolate or get the care they need how will this help the general public, as they are on the streets.
attributes.background: the homeless have always been one of our greatest vulnerable people, that we have failed to help many times
